user_input:
Please create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios.
Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. Use Hydrogen as the complement not the carrier
No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 using scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'] and years [2030, 2035, 2040, 2050]. Split nodes. Use Hydrogen as the complement (not the carrier). Do not access any PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 using scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'] and years [2030, 2035, 2040, 2050]; split nodes; use Hydrogen as the complement (not the carrier). No PLEXOS DB access.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Resolve function arguments solely from DAG user_input and any available local data files; do not query or modify any PLEXOS XML database.

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly demand profiles to TST format for TYNDP 2026 scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'] and years [2030, 2035, 2040, 2050]; carrier set to 'Hybrid Heat Pump'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Use the outputs from 'main_demand_processer_v2' and the DAG user_input to resolve file paths and export settings; do not access any PLEXOS database.
